Text: Sycamore Networks Acquires Sirocco Systems Cc request of John Griebling I am forwarding the following information regarding Sycamore Networks acquisition of Sirocco Systems You may listen to a playback of todays teleconference by dialing the highlighted numbers below and entering the reservation number Please note that playback is only available through pm EDT on June Thank you Michael Salinas ADVISORY Sycamore Networks Teleconference to Discuss Acquisition of Sirocco Systems June AM Eastern Time BUSINESS WIRE WHAT Sycamore Networks NASDAQSCMR will discuss acquisition of privately held Sirocco Systems All media and industry analysts are invited to call into the teleconference WHO Daniel E Smith president and CEO of Sycamore Networks Jonathan Reeves president and CEO of Sirocco Systems WHEN Tuesday June am EDT WHERE Via teleconference Domestic International Playback information or Reservation The call will be available for replay from am EDT on June through pm EDT on June CONTACT Sycamore Networks Rich Williams wk mobile or Melissa Morales wk mobile Michael Salinas Enron Broadband Services Office Cell
